item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. JD Vance urges billionaire Peter Thiel to help bankroll Trump campaign
2. Harris pitches for centre in first big TV interview as candidate
3. Republicans worry Trump’s campaign strategy against Harris is failing
4. Ukrainian F-16 crashes during mission to shoot down Russian missiles
5. Zelenskyy faces backlash over Russia’s breach of eastern defences
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
